entry.title: 【Cover by Guriri/グリリ】「glow (normal)]
entry.content:
This is Glow covered by Guriri on the original music. I feel her voice suits the original music than the Piano&strings Acoustic version, so I mix this one.
The orignal glow by keeno is from NICO NICO Douga http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm11209477
The version covered by Guriri http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm15640282
Here is the MP3 link. http://www.box.com/s/9oo9bp2qht4324vhsa03
Picture glow | コト [pixiv] http://www.pixiv.net/member_illust.php?mode=medium&illust_id=14967010

entry.title: Lost Story [Akiakane]
entry.content:
Source: http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm7676797 Download: http://nicosound.anyap.info/sound/sm7676797 press パソコンへ転送
Romaji lyrics: nani mo nai koto ga shiawase na no nara kono sekai kara boku wo tsure satte yo boku wa waratteta kimi wa naiteita makkurana keshiki ga tsuzuiteta
soko ni atta chigai hedatareta sekai tsunagatta hito shizuku migi ude ni tsutau imi no nai boku e oto no nai merodi ga
kikoeru youna ki ga shitan da tada makkurana sekai de
kanji nai koto ga tadashii no naraba sono kioku kara boku wo tachi kitte yo koboreta namida mo mou mieya shinai makkurana keshiki ga tsuzuiteta
tsukihi wa dore dake namida ni kawatta darou migite ni imi wa nai koko kara kie you?
nani mo nai koto ga shiawasena no nara kono sekai kara boku wo tsure satte yo boku wa waratteta kimi wa naiteita makkurana keshiki ga tsuzuiteta

entry.title: [Poucet] Kyrie Eleison {French vers.} TY for +7000 subs and Happy New Year
entry.content:
Mp3: https://app.box.com/s/pjfd83odev8w7cpp7878 /!/WARNING: LONG DESCRIPTION/!/ .. I have many things to say, I don't know how to start..
This song was a request I got on twitter. You know (or not) that I usually don't take requests but I listened to this one and.. "ahmygad, this. Is. Fabulous." So yeah, actually, I just adore this kind of song, really. Plus, my current mood is absolutely perfect for it haha.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Story of my life (if you are bored):
After recording it, I spent my entire day trying to mix it and I almost cried because I didn't manage to take off saturation, and yeah, it was ugly. I felt too bad coz it was the first time I was not able to do anything with a mixing, and I was so excited to sing this cover... Then SukinaK offered to mix it and I was like "why not, I'm so pissed, I give up." And-and-and when I listened to his first preview, I actually cried because he managed to do something good with my lines and I was so impressed and too many emotions and sobs- Then we kept mixing until like 1:00 am and he was always patient and ready to change any details ;u;// So.. once again Nana, thank you SO MUCH, you illuminated my grey day haha, I'm forever grateful! That's not really a matter of mixing or something, but you were here for me and yeah-
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
About the translation, as usual I tried to keep the original meaning, but also I changed words to make the singing more beautiful. If you want to find another translation of this song, you can read Estrelia's one: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2DwM8-Ljkks As she said, lyrics can have several meanings /o/
About the singing: it was not easy at all to find a balance with the different ways of singing.. sometimes it's whisper, sometimes powerful, sometimes a mix with the both... French note: j'ai remarqué que je faisais encore des erreurs de liaisons entre les mots.. ou plutôt que je ne faisais /pas/ certaines liaisons.. j'en suis consciente, je vais essayer de me corriger! ;A;//
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Finally, since it is my last cover for 2013, I wish you, guys, the best for 2014!! And thank you soooo much for + 7000 subs and for your support in YT comments and on twitter and everywhere! ;u;// Sorry for the very long description xD I love you! ///
... Thought for Megu- ...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits:
Title: kyrie Eleison Vocals, French translation, "art": Poucet Mix: http://www.youtube.com/user/SukinaKukki (thank you²²²²²²²²²²²²² dear Noodle!) Lyric: オカメP [ OkameP ] Music: オカメP [ OkameP ] Arrange: オカメP [ OkameP ] Original vocals: Hatsune Miku Append Dark

media:group.media:description:
Mp3: https://app.box.com/s/pjfd83odev8w7cpp7878 /!/WARNING: LONG DESCRIPTION/!/ .. I have many things to say, I don't know how to start..
This song was a request I got on twitter. You know (or not) that I usually don't take requests but I listened to this one and.. "ahmygad, this. Is. Fabulous." So yeah, actually, I just adore this kind of song, really. Plus, my current mood is absolutely perfect for it haha.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Story of my life (if you are bored):
After recording it, I spent my entire day trying to mix it and I almost cried because I didn't manage to take off saturation, and yeah, it was ugly. I felt too bad coz it was the first time I was not able to do anything with a mixing, and I was so excited to sing this cover... Then SukinaK offered to mix it and I was like "why not, I'm so pissed, I give up." And-and-and when I listened to his first preview, I actually cried because he managed to do something good with my lines and I was so impressed and too many emotions and sobs- Then we kept mixing until like 1:00 am and he was always patient and ready to change any details ;u;// So.. once again Nana, thank you SO MUCH, you illuminated my grey day haha, I'm forever grateful! That's not really a matter of mixing or something, but you were here for me and yeah-
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
About the translation, as usual I tried to keep the original meaning, but also I changed words to make the singing more beautiful. If you want to find another translation of this song, you can read Estrelia's one: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2DwM8-Ljkks As she said, lyrics can have several meanings /o/
About the singing: it was not easy at all to find a balance with the different ways of singing.. sometimes it's whisper, sometimes powerful, sometimes a mix with the both... French note: j'ai remarqué que je faisais encore des erreurs de liaisons entre les mots.. ou plutôt que je ne faisais /pas/ certaines liaisons.. j'en suis consciente, je vais essayer de me corriger! ;A;//
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Finally, since it is my last cover for 2013, I wish you, guys, the best for 2014!! And thank you soooo much for + 7000 subs and for your support in YT comments and on twitter and everywhere! ;u;// Sorry for the very long description xD I love you! ///
... Thought for Megu- ...
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

entry.title: 【Akiakane】『100度目のロックスター』【English Subs】
entry.content:
Song from Akiakane's newest album, ぼろぼろな生き様. I highly suggest buying the album if you can, so you can support the artist. I did such before subbing this song.
■ Song: 100度目のロックスター ■ Lyrics: ゆよゆっぺ /SaiB ■ Composer: ゆよゆっぺ /SaiB ■ Vocals: Akiakane ■ Illustration: Akiakane ■ Translation: animeyay
I do not own anything. The video will taken down if the original author requests.
http://akiakane.net/ http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B007A8B5AY/ http://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B007A8CS1O/ ----- I love this song, and while I requested a translation for Dryad, I also requested this one. The lyrics are very odd, as to be expected from a saiB/Akiakane song, I suppose.
Transliteration and translation of the song here: http://www.animelyrics.com/doujin/akiakane/100domenorockstar.htm

entry.title: Mozaik Role [Rishe]
entry.content:
http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm11459549
Romaji yrics: toaru kotoba ga kimi ni tsuki sasari kizuguchi kara more dasu eki o "ai" to keiyō shite mita
omoi yari no ketsujo to katachi dake no kōbi wa kusare en no kimi to atashi ni yoku nite iru "sore demo suki..." toka (lol)
aishitatte ī ja naika shibari daremo fure nai yō kore mo unmei ja nai ka kieru kieru toaru aise
owaru koro niwa kimi ni ai teru yo ai ka yoku ka wakarazu hanatsu koto wa nanto shiyō ka
omoi yari no ketsujo to katachi dake no kōbi wa kusare en no kimi to atashi ni yoku nite iru sore demo ī kara...
aishita tte iu no desu ka? shigami tsui te mogaku koto o koroshita tte ī ja nai ka kimi ga kirau atashi nante
aishitatte ī ja naika shibari daremo fure nai yō kore mo unmei ja nai ka kieru kieru toaru aise
